room_title: Escape room "Lost Friday Night" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: A group of 6 of us did Lost Friday Night and it was really fun. At the end, the people running the game came in and rehashed all the clues and game play with us which was a little dull and went on longer than we thought was necessary, but otherwise it was great- we'll definitely be returning to do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Lost Friday Night" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: Was skeptical at first. However, I really had a good time. We had a group of about 12 coworkers in the Lost Friday room. Lots of fun. I am looking forward to going again to the Sherlock room.

room_title: Escape room "Lost Friday Night" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: Very well thought out and detailed. We did the Lost Pharaoh and had fun. We didnâ€™t escape but we definitely thought it was fun.

room_title: Escape room "Lost Friday Night" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: Went with my team in the 'Lost Friday Night' puzzle. Had a great time. It was my first escape room and it met all my expectations!
